div.p: Greetings. I am sending to you, most esteemed lord, a document from which you will learn about the events occurring here and those recently happening in the Netherlands.
I am also sending the letters of Mr. Haller, which Mr. Schenck requested to be included with mine. He also asked me to convey his many greetings to you on his behalf.
Your most devoted, Georg von Stetten. To the reverend, pious, and learned lord Heinrich Bullinger, the most faithful leader of the Zurich church, his esteemed lord and friend. In Zurich.
